BioShock Infinite,esse jogo é muito bom e no msm tempo complexo e meio q bizarro o contexto do seu enrredo se vc não prestar muita atenção em cada detalhe que é submetido,dps que os games anteriores fizeram sucesso a 2k deixou a irrational games e conseguiram fazer uma maravilha.

  ele tem uma jogabilidade simples com uma fluidez otima,personagens bem carismaticos a ponto de gostarem deles ou terem um odio de outros,o cenario belissimo que encanta olhos de quem ta jogando,ele não tem mini-mapa como a maioria dos jogos costuma ter mas com 1 botão ele indica onde deve ser seguido.

 Apenas um ponto negativo pra mim é que ele é meio curto(eu completei ele em 14 hrs mas isso foi contado junto das 2 dlcs(burial at sea episodio 1 e 2) q são tbm magnificas indo em uma pegada mais stealth(msm sendo forçado).

  O preço ta meio salgado mas se for ver vai valer cada centavo.

If you like Graphic Design and Adventure, This is your game!!

The history OMG! is Wonderful!!

This game stole my 10 points!

First off I'm not a big fan of console port to PC games and I usually avoid them,  witch means just about every triple A game designer out there.  But Infinite being ported to Linux and it did kinda look cool I thought I would throw my money and support to the game.  Nevertheless I always have a hard time with console games, you see normally they suck, most of the time.

So you can imagine my surprise when I found the game to be exceptionally cool, the graphics are awesome and smooth on ultra,  the environments are gorgeous, sure its not the most realistic graphics I've seen but they are all the same very nicely done.  The story is a bit vague at first but very entertaining and interesting to say the least and one of this games greatest strengths.   

The story and incredible environment is enough to overcome most of the terrible console deficiencies that it does suffer from.   It does have one of the best menus I have seen for a console port, however the lack of a save game option that you can reload to certain parts to replay is a major bummer.  While you can go back to previous chapters it rewrites your one and only save game and you loose all your progress.

Gun play is a bit different at first but not a problem, mapped keys are off but can be altered so no real problem there.  The worst problem I have with console games is the everything is a handed to you ride the rails mash two buttons and you win game play.  Which unfortunately this game does suffers from, the only real skill involved is the gun fights but with no real consequences of death.  

All that said it is still very fun, its awesome story and action coupled with intense graphical environment and music, I forgot the sound track its really great too.  Even with its glaring console issues it still is a 4 out of 5 star game.  4 ½ because of the Linux port I would like to see what these developers could do if they made a true open world RPG style PC game, they have the environmental and story telling talent! 

With great games like this running on Linux the days of Winblows infecting my computer are almost at a end, thank you! Good game 4 ½ stars!
Awesome beginning and middle to this game, but it starts to drag on towards the end.  Luckily it picks back up for a mind blowing conclusion.  Not perfect but perfectly flawed.

Non sono un amante degli sparatutto, o almeno lo ero. Oltre ad avere un buon gameplay che è riuscito a tenermi attaccato allo schermo per ore e ore, Bioshock mi ha lasciato senza parole per la trama e il finale mozzafiato che non si trovano più nei VideoGiochi di oggi (o almeno, non in tutti). Elizabeth è uno dei personaggi più belli e profondi che abbia mai visto a cui mi sono subito affezionato accompagnata ovviamente dai due adorabili fratelli Lutece e il loro affascinante sarcasmo. Un vero peccato che non si possa accedere al Dlc ''Funerale in Mare'' (ma da quanto ho capito su youtube, non è necessario)

" Rapture une fois, Rapture deux fois ... J'en ai un peu marre de l'eau ! " Ne t'inquiète pas, Kévin, ce troisième volet ne se passe pas dans l'eau mais dans les cummulus !

Vous êtes maintenant le beau Booker DeWitt envoyé dans les nuages pour une mission qui reprendra les éléments de gameplay des autres Bioshock ( bien que vous soyez, cette fois, un peu plus limité dans l'arsenal que vous transportez ^^' )

Pour qui as aimé les précédents Bioshock, ce troisième volet est un " must-have ". La suite d'une saga toujours aussi bonne ( contrairement à un certains Assassin's Creed ^^' )

Bref, amusez-vous bien en vous " envoyant en l'air " ! *HEEEEEAAAYYYYYYYYYYYHHH !*

This is a masterpiece, and I'd reccomend it to almost anyone. If you're wondering about why its rated M, I'll tell about the worst of each of its "content descriptors"

Blood and Gore: when shooting people there are blood splatters, and when getting a headshot with a shotgun their heads disappear and blood squirts out of their body. You can also do a "melee execution", which can include sawing into their neck, breaking their neck, cutting their head off, and more of that nature. When you consume a "vigor" you see prolonged images of your hands going through a transformation. You see your hands burning to the bone, crystals shooting out of them, and other gory displays.

Intense Violence: You witness someone being stabbed in the back with a sharp pair of scissors. She falls and slowly dies. You also kill a man by repeatedly whacking his head against stone and forcfully drowning him.

Language: Nothing too bad here. Your charactor says "what the hell", "God d**n it", "s**t", and "son of a b**ch". Elizabeth says "oh my God", and "d**n", but very infrequently.

Mild Sexual Themes: I actually haven't noticed much. Elizabeth's breasts are slightly exposed throughout the game, but not more than you see the streets these days. I've also been told theres a porn shop somewhere with mild suggestive images, but I haven't seen it.

Use of Alchohol and Tobacco: You see a few people smoking on the streets of Columbia. You can also smoke a cigarette to regain health, but only at the beginning of the game. I think you can also consume liquor.

There is also racism, but you're never forced to take part in it. This game was a wonderful expierience, I by all means reccomend it!

There are some critiques to be made gameplay wise in the final hours of the game.  But nothing that bad.  What was amazing was the affective connection I had with Elizabeth all the way through the end of the DLC.  Not since Mass Effect have I cared so much about a character.  The way they built your and Booker's relationship with Elizabeth was masterful.
Fantastic gameplay and a really interesting atmosphere, not quite as creepy as the previous BioShock entries, but a fun play nonetheless.

Amazing game. It provided hours of mystery, wonder, and fun. Elizabeth's role in both gameplay and the story is awe-inspiring and jaw-dropping. I highly recommend this game to anyone who likes to play singleplayer questions. The plot twists are predictable enough to the point where you can understand the story but not to the point where it ruins the experience of surprise. A little easy due to the health, ammo, salt, and coins that Elizaneth picks up but not to the point where if you have no clue what you are doing you'll be just fine. It does require a little bit of experience in other FPS games. However I will say the objective pointing system ruins the intuition of what to do, though I hardly used it myself. I would say it is worth the $30.00 it sells for and an amazing game to buy for a discount.
I'd give it a 4.8/5

For years, I've played up to the 75% mark of the story and for some reason dropped it. And never have I ever regretted anything so much. The last night I finished this game for the first time, and I gotta admit, it was damn bloody amazing. The gameplay might feel a bit clunky if you are, as me, acustom to the modern fps shooters like COD, CSGO, and Spec Ops (Yes. yes I am aware Spec Ops isn't first person). But it'll come to you, It gets fun, intense and best of all emotional and mindfucking. This game is without a doubt on my top 10. Maybe even top 5. The story is amazing, the gameplay while weird IS fun. The soundtrack and voice acting is also very good. 

Just remember, LOOK EVERYWHERE FOR MONEY AND AMMO! or you're gonna have a bad time. (South Park refference intended.)

Были конечно и минусы, но они абсолютно исчезают на фоне сюжета и качественной графики.
All three games have surprised me and this one also changed my whole idea about the first two, this game was/is the most charming, adventurous and mysterious game I've ever played.

Nem találom a szavakat, ez a játék egy remekmű! Kötelező darab minden játékosnak, mert amilyen élményt nyújt még többszöri végigjátszársa is, arra nagyon kevés játék képes.

[h1] I totally can´t say this game is perfect, I totally can´t say is the best game of the generation or decade, I can´t say many good things about this game thanks to the stupid  idea of the director... to make this game look like another Call of Duty. "I want to bring CoD public to him" he said, and that is one of the most horrible things I´ve ever heard coming out from the mouth of a person who loves his creation.[/h1]

[u]So, where do we start?[/u] Columbia, a gorgeous flying city, with one of the best details I´ve ever seen, an amazing experience is waiting in this road to rescue Elizabeth... but is this experience nice to play it?
As I said, no, it´s not, the game mechanics itself it´s not made to be as a shooter at all, the tonics mechanic is not fresh, it was already used on the other games, but I´m not saying this is bad, it´s actually what makes Bioshock special. So that´s not the problem, the biggest problem this game has is all those shooter scenes which increase the durability of the game in a false way, because if you play it in hard you´re gonna die lot´s of times, and there would be many times that you´ll stop playing it because of the number of these stages, so the experience becomes itself long, repetitive and boring.

Besides of that, this game is not bad, story and ambientation is amazing with one of the best OST I´ve ever heard.
But that problem stills perduring in my head even when I´m enjoying the game.

I just don´t know if there´s someone who thinks or lives what I´m saying, but I think even the fans of this game[b](and I´m included in this group)[/b] should recognise that shooter mechanics don´t favors this game.
Also there´s sometimes that the story doesn´t even make sense.

[b]So, my final note of this game is a 4/10[/b], I loved it when I was playing normal parts, but beating it in less than 2 days, makes me see it as a boring normal shooter. But I repeat, everything not related with shooter was perfect.
Simplesmente Incrível! *-*

I cried when I first saw the city up in the clouds and the music kicked in. I-I am not even kidding, salty, manly tears came out of my eyes. It was all so, so beautiful. Everything is. Pacing, combat, enviroments, Elizabeth in particular is incredible. Rarely does an NPC steal the spotlight so effectively that makes it something that doesn't hold the game back. Plus, you are an ex Pinkerton agent. How cool is that ? Every note when it comes to Irrational's type of game is hit. All except for two. One is the heights. I am a bit of a pussy when it comes to heights.

The other is the feeling of empowerment. The original Bioshock provided this amply and steadily. You were somewhat of a superhero when the game ended. I didn't get that feeling here. Maybe I am not supposed to. Vigors are more awesome than plasmids but the fact that the latters came 6 at a time as opposed to 2, offered more gameplay choices. Why shouldn't I crow them, lift em up and then mule kick them in the air ?

Regardless, this is a book disguised as a triple A game. It harkens back to the original game in many, MANY ways and its' DLC also merits obligatory attention as one of the most impactful and gut-busting endings in history.
Un juegaso, la historia, la trama, los personajes es excelente!!!! recomendado un 100 %

Плюсы:
► Сюжет 
►Атмосфера 
► Огромный и красочный мир, в котором каждый уголок полон деталей которые хочется посмотреть. 
► Элизабет :3 (Именно этот герой оставит в вашей памяти след, Элизабет не просто напарник который тупо следует за вами и что-то бормочет себе под нос, она взаимодействует со всем окружающим миром с каждой его частичкой делая игру ярче и интереснее) 
►Обширное количество классных плазмидов и в добавок их ещё можно апгрейднуть, и ещё куча различных деталей которые делают геймплей очень интересным. 
► Множество разных типов врагов 
► Пасхалки и различные приколюхи от разработчиков которые можно обнаружить во время игры.
► Ну и конечно же в игре не мало сложных ачивок которые могут привлечь игроков которые любят проходить игры на 100% а именно хардкор мод, сбор различных аудиозаписей и апгрейдов и т.д.)
Минусы:
►Минусов нет, игра идеальна

Сюжет:
Действия происходят в "Колумбии", городе, который весит в небесах. Главный герой, Букер ДеВитт, отправился в колумбию, что бы отплатить долг(какой долг игра умалчивает). Во время игры, расскрываются различные тайны, и многое другое.Во время прохождения, нам будут помогать Розалинда Лютес и Роберт Люте, они говорят загадками, но это придает изюминку! Графика, на высоте! Не, ну серъезно. Игра 2013 года и графикак до сих пор удивляет(причем хорошо оптимизирована)
Вообщем не буду расскрывать все вкусняшки(ищите сами ;) ) 
Игра 10/10!

Inutile de le dire mais bon, un jeu tout simplement magnifique, une histoire formidable et bien pensée avec beaucoup de reflexion et de choses a découvrir, il faut simplement bien prendre le temps de tout explorer afin de s'en rendre compte, à ne surtout pas louper. Je pourrai y rejouer encore et encore tellement ce jeu m'a marqué.
Je recommande également les deux dlcs "Burial at sea ep.1,2", que ce soit pour des explications plus claires des anciens Bioshock et/ou tout simplement pour le gameplay, bien que celui l'ep.2 soit en partie different par rapport à l'histoire principale.
Campagne ou dlcs, dans tous les cas, soyez prêt pour la fin qui m'a tout simplement laissé sans voix.

Edit : Je le nomine par la même occasion, c'est un chef-d'oeuvre. Re-nomination 2017

Great plot and gameplay.

«Город святых» 

Среди лучей солнечного света,
И лёгких, белоснежных облаков,
Парит в небе чудо света,
Священный город без грехов.

И общество в нём тоже идеально,
У людей цвет кожи, словно снег,
И выражаясь фигурально,
Чем белее кожа, тем святее человек.

И там народом управлял святой Пророк,
Чью дочку охранял охранник страшный,
И лучше выдумать Пророк не мог,
Чем спрятать девушку в высокой башне.

И паству Он свою предостерёг,
Что в город поднимается Лжепастырь,
Чтоб народ святого Агнца уберёг,
От боли, лжи, страданий и несчастья.

Вот так ирония внезапная, увы,
Не каждый тут смог бы догадаться,
Ведь Лжепастырем являлись Вы,
И Вам с Пророком надо разобраться.

Летящий город рухнул, быстро пал,
А у Пророка голова слетела с плеч,
Ведь правильно Иисус в Писании сказал:
«Не мир Я Вам принёс, но меч!»

I had very few issues with this game. There were a few times when it felt as though I was being spoon-fed the plot; I didn't feel rushed, but the narrative of the game pulled very strongly. That being said, I think it was appropriate and ultimately well-handled. The characters were quite believable, the combat was engaging, and the story went places I never could have expected. BioShock Infinite is one of the best games I've played since... well, since BioShock 1, actually.
只恨自己没有在第一时间玩这个游戏，而是时隔多年以后的2016年1月才通关，剧情可以说堪比大片，人物刻画极其深刻，画面精美无与伦比。

Just finished playing the game and I say, this is DEFINITELY one of the BEST game I've ever played. I was wondering which game to buy during the previous sales. After some searches of the similar type of FPS game I played, this one has one of the highest ratings and reviews. Also, I took a look of this game and read many reviews and ratings. Finally, I bought it with hope that this game works fine and interesting. It turned out to be EXCELLENTly NICE! I am just so glad that I bought it & will defintely get the DLCs soon. If you like FPS type of game with some fantasy, you will definitely enjoy BioShock Infinite. AWESOME ONE! Don't have any doubt, just get it ASAP!
This game is so beautiful that words aren't enough to describe it.

作为一款游戏，它对故事的描绘远比小说、电影生动具体。表面繁荣的哥伦比亚城最终走向衰败，战争让美丽的天空之城变成了孤寂的死城，游戏画面都能把气氛充分渲染出来。

existem dois tipos de pessoas no mundo , as q gostam de jogos , e as q gostam de Bioshock infinite

Bioshock infinite lived up to the hype for me even though I beat the game (on hard) 2.5 years later. It took me a good couple of hours to sit down and mash it out and I'm glad that it kept me so invested.

The storyline and premise was amazing and the voice acting and sassy comments from Booker kept the experience fresh and enjoyable. Unfortunately, there were a few continuity issues, but that may be expected given the overall premise of the story. I was mildly shocked at how abruptly the end came about though.

At times the combat felt flavorless but the story progression helped keep me wanting to get past its issues.

Overall, my main complaints was the upgrade system. It felt clunky and unfulfilled and once I had finished upgrading a few weapons, the game was already over, and I would never touch any of the other ones. Except out of desparation.

I played burial at sea as well and they helped bring the story back into rapture.

I love this game! I am a huge bioshock fan and have played the first bioshock many times I was delighted to finally pick this game up and try it for the first time. It's stays true to the core of bioshock while introducing new groundbreaking elements and a new city to experience. It was great to feel the intensity of bioshock with a new brighter atmosphere really creative new favorite game 10/10

This is what a game should be; something that draws you in with a death-grip and won't let go until the very end.  A story so deep and twisted, with a truly epic plot twist in the end that will leave you breathless.  

There's a reason why Bioshocl Infinite won numerous awards:  the graphics and fluid gameplay; the ability to upgrade weapons and attributes; the depth of the characters, their backstories and the voice acting...it's all so 'fleshed out' that you'll not only feel that you're a part of everything that's going on in Columbia but that you're also a part of each character's life, characters that you'll likely never forget until the end of your days.  The Burial At Seal episodes are a great touch as well and further the plot that unfolds in the main game, with the second and final part being so epic that it feels like a game unto itself.  

All of the Bioshock games are phenomenal achievements, not just as far as games go, but also as works of art; games that let you know the developers feel as strongly about their product as all of us gamers do. Bioshock Infinite though....is truly a masterwork that must be experienced.

P.S. Try it on 1999 mode while not using vending machines.  It's extremely challenging but to a fault - you won't regret the journey if you make it to the end in one piece :]
Excelente!
Enchanting world and story! Ending is a little fucked up, but still satisfying. Also, Elizabeth may be the greatest video game character ever made.

Will the circle be unbroken?

Would you kindly bring us the girl and wipe away the debt.

Eines der besten Spiele, die ich kenne. Klare Kaufempfehlung, auch für beide DLCs und die vorherigen Teile von Bioshock! Das Setting ist genial und sehr atmosphärisch, das Gameplay macht Spaß und die Story hat  mich mehr als einmal zum Nachdenken gebracht.

Im Wintersale gekauft und auf jeden Fall lohnend!Die grafik ist für das Erscheinungsdatum mehr als gut und die vielen Details in der Spielwelt lassen sie sehr authentisch wirken.
Zur Story:Einfach nur hervorragend und absolut unvorhersehbar.
Das Ende haut einen auch um und erklärt viele Dinge im Spiel.
Fazit:Sein Geld wert und im Gegensatz zu den vorigen Bioshockteilen nochmal ein neues Setting,nur wird es nach diesem Ende wahrscheinlich leider keinen nächsten Teil geben

This game is just epic. Bought all 3 bioshocks for 10 euro, played first, then second, and they were... not in my type. But Infinite... It's just wow... Most beautiful game i've ever played, AND THAT MUSIC!!!
Una obra maestra. Simple y sencillamente una maravillosa obra maestra.
